GE07bhg4c09u:1337: yad ahaṃ jugupsita-karmaṇy api bhakte 'nurajyaṃs tam utkarṣayāmīti pūrvārthaṃ puṣṇann āha api ced iti /
GE07bhg4c09u:1338: ananya-bhāk janaś cet sudurācāro 'tivigarhita-karmāpi san māṃ bhajate mat-kīrtanādibhir māṃ sevate tad api sa sādhur eva mantavyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c09u:1339: matto 'nyāṃ devatāṃ na bhajty āśrayatīti mad-ekāntī mām eva svāminaṃ parama-pumarthaṃ ca jānann ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c09u:1340: ubhayathā vartamāno 'pi sādhutvena sa pūjya iti bodhayitum eva-kāraḥ /
GE07bhg4c09u:1341: tasya tathātve manane mantavya iti sva-nideśa-rūpo vidhiś ca darśitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c09u:1343: ubhayathāpi vartamānasya sādhutvam evety atroktaṃ hetuṃ puṣṇann āha samyag iti /
GE07bhg4c09u:1344: yad asau samyag-vyavasito mad-ekānta-niṣṭhā-rūpa-śreṣṭha-niścayavān ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c09u:1352: kaunteya pratijānīhi na me bhaktaḥ praṇaśyati //31//
GE07bhg4c09u:1353: śrīdharaḥ - nanu kathaṃ samīcīnādhyavasāya-mātreṇa sādhur mantavyaḥ ?
GE07bhg4c09u:1355: sudurācāro 'pi māṃ bhajan śīghraṃ dharma-citto bhavati /
GE07bhg4c09u:1356: tataś ca śaśvac-chāntiṃ cittopaplavoparama-rūpāṃ parameśvara-niṣṭhāṃ nitarāṃ gacchati prāpnoti /
GE07bhg4c09u:1357: kutarka-karkaśa-vādino naitātmanyerann iti śaṅkākulam arjunaṃ protsāhayati he kaunteya
GE07bhg4c09u:1358: paṭahādi-mahā-ghoṣa-pūrvakaṃ vivadamānānāṃ sabhāṃ gatvā bāhum utkṣipya niḥśaṅkaṃ
GE07bhg4c09u:1360: katham ? me parameśvarasya bhaktaḥ sudurācāro 'pi na praṇaśyati /
GE07bhg4c09u:1362: tataś ca te taṃ prauḍhi-vijṛmbha-vidhvaṃsita-kutarkāḥ santo niḥsaṃśayaṃ tvām eva gurutvenāśrayeran //31//
GE07bhg4c09u:1363: madhusūdanaḥ - asmād eva samyag-vyavasāyāt sa hitvā durācāratāṃ kṣipram iti /
GE07bhg4c09u:1364: cira-kālam adharmātmāpi mad-bhajana-mahimnā kṣipraṃ śīghram eva bhavati dharmātmā dharmānugat-citto durācāratvaṃ jhaṭity eva tyaktvā sad-ācāro bhavatīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c09u:1365: kiṃ ca śaśvan nityaṃ śāntiṃ viṣaya-bhogaspṛhā-nivṛttiṃ nigacchati nitarāṃ prāpnoty atinirvedāt /
GE07bhg4c09u:1366: kaścit tvad-bhaktaḥ prāg abhyastaṃ durācāratvam atyajan na bhaved api dharmātmā /
GE07bhg4c09u:1367: tathā ca sa naśyed eveti nety āha bhaktānukampāparavaśatayā kupita iva bhagavān /
GE07bhg4c09u:1368: naitad āścaryaṃ manvīthā he kaunteya niścitam evedṛśaṃ mad-bhakter māhātmyam /
GE07bhg4c09u:1369: ato vipratipannānāṃ purastād api tvaṃ pratijānīhi sāvajñaṃ sa-garvaṃ ca pratijñāṃ kuru /
GE07bhg4c09u:1370: na me vāsudevasya bhatko 'tidurācāro 'pi prāṇa-saṅkaṭam āpanno 'pi sudurlabham ayogyaḥ san prārtahaymāno 'pi atimūḍho 'śaraṇo 'pi na praṇaśyati kiṃ tu kṛtārtha eva bhavatīti /
GE07bhg4c09u:1372: śāstraṃ ca na vāsudeva-bhaktānām aśubhaṃ vidyate kvacit iti //31//
GE07bhg4c09u:1373: viśvanāthaḥ --- nanu tādṛśasyādharmiṇaḥ kathaṃ bhajanaṃ tvaṃ gṛhṇāsi ?
GE07bhg4c09u:1374: kāma-krodhādi-dūṣitāntaḥkaraṇena niveditam anna-pānādikaṃ katham aśnāsīty ata āha kṣipraṃ śīghram eva sa dharmātmā bhavati /
GE07bhg4c09u:1375: atra kṣipraṃ bhāvī sa dharmātmā śaśvac-chāntiṃ gamiṣyatīti aprayujya bhavati gacchatīti
GE07bhg4c09u:1376: vartamāna-prayogāt adharma-karaṇānantaram eva mām anusmṛtya kṛtānutāpaḥ kṣipram eva dharmātmā bhavati /
GE07bhg4c09u:1377: hanta hanta mat-tulyaḥ ko 'pi bhakta-lokaṃ kalaṅkayann adhamo nāsti /
GE07bhg4c09u:1378: tad vidyām iti śaśvat punaḥ punar api śāntiṃ nirvedaṃ nitarāṃ gacchati /
GE07bhg4c09u:1379: yad vā kiyataḥ samayād anantaraṃ tasya bhāvi dharmātmatvaṃ tadānīm api sūkṣma-rūpeṇa
GE07bhg4c09u:1380: vartata evaṃ tan manasi bhakteḥ preveśāt yathā pīte mahauṣadhi sati tadānīṃ kiya-kāla-paryantaṃ
GE07bhg4c09u:1382: viṣa-dāho vā vartamāno 'pi na gaṇyata iti dhvaniḥ /
GE07bhg4c09u:1383: tataś ca tasya bhaktasya durācāratva-gamakāḥ kāma-krodhādyā utkhāta-daṃṣṭroraga-daṃśavad akiñcitkarā eva jñeyā iti anudhvaniḥ /
GE07bhg4c09u:1384: ataeva śaśvat sarvadaiva śāntiṃ kāma-krodhādy-upaśamaṃ nitarāṃ gacchaty atiśayena prāpnotīti durācāratva-daśāyām api sa śuddhāntaḥkaraṇa eva ucyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c09u:1385: nanu yadi sa dharmātmā syāt tadā nāsti ko 'pi vivādaḥ /
GE07bhg4c09u:1386: kintu kaścid durācāra-bhakto maraṇa-paryantam api durācāratvaṃ na jahāti,
GE07bhg4c09u:1387: tasya kā vārtā ity ato bhakta-vatsalo bhagavān sa-prauḍhi sa-kopam ivāha kaunteyeti /
GE07bhg4c09u:1389: tad api prāṇa-nāśe adhaḥpātaṃ na yāti /
GE07bhg4c09u:1390: kutarka-karkaśa-vādino naitan manyerann iti śoka-śaṅkā-vyākulam arjunaṃ protsāhayati
GE07bhg4c09u:1391: he kaunteya paṭahakāhalādi-mahā-ghoṣa-pūrvakaṃ vivadamānānāṃ sabhāṃ gatvā bāhum utkṣipya
GE07bhg4c09u:1393: katham ? me mama parameśvarasya bhakto durācāro 'pi na praṇeśyety api tu kṛtārtha eva bhavati /
GE07bhg4c09u:1394: tataś ca te taṃ prauḍhi-vijṛmbhita-vidhvaṃsita-kutarkāḥ santo niḥsaṃśayaṃ tvām eva gurutvenāśrayeran iti svāmi-caraṇāḥ /
GE07bhg4c09u:1395: nanu kathaṃ bhagavān svayam apratijñāya pratijñātum arjunam evātidideśa /
GE07bhg4c09u:1396: yathaivāgre mām evaiṣyasi satyaṃ te pratijāne priyo 'si me iti vakṣyate /
GE07bhg4c09u:1397: tathaivātrāpi kaunteya pratijāne 'haṃ na me bhaktaḥ praṇaśyati iti kathaṃ noktam ?
GE07bhg4c09u:1398: ucyate - bhagavatā tadānīm eva vicāritaṃ bhakta-vatsalena mayā sva-bhaktāpakarṣa-leśam
GE07bhg4c09u:1399: apy asahiṣṇunā sva-pratijñāṃ khaṇḍayitvāpi svāpa-karṣam aṅgīkṛtyāpi bhakta-pratijñaiva rakṣitā bahutra /
GE07bhg4c09u:1400: yathā tatraiva bhīṣma-yuddhe sva-pratijñām apy apākṛtya bhīṣma-pratijñaiva rakṣiṣyate,
GE07bhg4c09u:1401: bahirmukhā vādino vaitaṇḍikā mat-pratijñāṃ śrutvā hasiṣyanti arjuna-pratijñā tu pāṣāṇa-rekhaiveti te pratiyanti /
GE07bhg4c09u:1403: atra etādṛśa-durācārasyāpi ananya-bhakti-śravaṇād ananya-bhaktābhidhāyaka-vākyeṣu sarvatra na vidyate
GE07bhg4c09u:1406: sudurācāro 'pi māṃ bhajan śīghraṃ dharma-citto bhavati /
GE07bhg4c09u:1407: tataś ca śaśvac- chāntiṃ cittopaplavoparama-rūpāṃ parameśvara-niṣṭhāṃ nitarāṃ gacchati prāpnoti /
GE07bhg4c09u:1408: kutarka-karkaśa-vādino naitātmanyerann iti śaṅkākulam arjunaṃ protsāhayati he kaunteya
GE07bhg4c09u:1409: paṭahādi-mahā-ghoṣa-pūrvakaṃ vivadamānānāṃ sabhāṃ gatvā bāhum utkṣipya niḥśaṅkaṃ
GE07bhg4c09u:1411: katham ? me parameśvarasya bhaktaḥ sudurācāro 'pi na praṇaśyati /
GE07bhg4c09u:1413: tataś ca te tvat prauḍhi-vijṛmbha-vidhvaṃsita-kutarkāḥ santo niḥsaṃśayaṃ tvām eva gurutvenāśrayeran //31//
GE07bhg4c09u:1415: māṃ hi pārtha vyapāśritya ye 'pi syuḥ pāpayonayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c09u:1416: striyo vaiśyās tathā śūdrās te 'pi yānti parāṃ gatim //32//
GE07bhg4c09u:1417: śrīdharaḥ - svācāra-bhraṣṭaṃ mad-bhaktiḥ pavitrīkarotīti kim atra citram ?
GE07bhg4c09u:1418: yato mad-bhaktir duṣkulān apy anadhikāriṇo 'pi saṃsārān mocayatīty āha māṃ hīti /
GE07bhg4c09u:1422: te 'pi māṃ vyāpāśritya saṃsevya parāṃ gatiṃ yānti /
GE07bhg4c09u:1424: madhusūdanaḥ - evam āgantuka-doṣeṇa duṣṭānāṃ bhagavad-bhakti-prabhāvān nistāram uktvā svābhāvika-doṣeṇa duṣṭānām api tam āha māṃ hīti /
GE07bhg4c09u:1425: hi niścitaṃ he pārtha māṃ vyapāścitya śaraṇam āgatya ye 'pi syuḥ pāpa-yonayo 'ntyajās tiryañco vā jāti-doṣeṇa duṣṭāḥ /
GE07bhg4c09u:1426: tathī̀a vedādhyayanādi-śūnyatayā nikṛṣṭāḥ striyo vaiśyāḥ kṛṣyādi-mātra-ratāḥ /
GE07bhg4c09u:1427: tathā śūdrā jātito 'dhyayanādy-abhāvena ca parama-gaty-ayogyās te 'pi yānti parāṃ gatim /
GE07bhg4c09u:1429: viśvanāthaḥ --- evaṃ karmaṇā durācārāṇām āgantukān doṣān mad-bhaktir na gaṇayati iti kiṃ citram ?
GE07bhg4c09u:1430: yato jātyaiva durācārāṇāṃ svābhāvikān api doṣān mad-bhaktir na gaṇayatīty āha mām iti /
GE07bhg4c09u:1438: tepus tapas te juhuvuḥ sasnur āryā
GE07bhg4c09u:1441: baladevaḥ - mahā-ghoṣa-pūrvakaṃ vivadamānānāṃ sabhāṃ gatvā bāhum utkṣipya niḥśaṅkaṃ pratijānīhi pratijñāṃ kuru sarveśvaro 'haṃ mad-ekāntināṃ āgantuka-doṣān vidhunomīti kiṃ citram ?
GE07bhg4c09u:1442: yad atipāpino 'pi mad-bhakta-prasaṅgād vidhūtāvidyā vimucyanta ity āha māṃhīti /
GE07bhg4c09u:1443: ye pāpa-yonayo 'ntyajāḥ sahaja-durācārāḥ syus te 'pi mad-bhakta-prasaṅgena māṃ sarveśaṃ
GE07bhg4c09u:1444: vasudeva-sutaṃ vyapāśritya śaraṇam āgatya parāṃ yogi-durlabhāṃ gatiṃ mat-prāptiṃ
GE07bhg4c09u:1451: atrāsya lokasyānityatvaṃ kaṇṭhato bruvan harir mithyātvaṃ tasya nirāsāt //32//
GE07bhg4c09u:1453: kiṃ punar brāhmaṇāḥ puṇyā bhaktā rājarṣayas tathā /
GE07bhg4c09u:1454: anityam asukhaṃ lokam imaṃ prāpya bhajasva mām //33//
GE07bhg4c09u:1455: śrīdharaḥ - yadaivaṃ tadā sat-kulāḥ sad-ācārāś ca mad-bhaktāḥ parāṃ gatiṃ yānti iti kiṃ vaktavyam ity āha kiṃ punar iti /
GE07bhg4c09u:1457: tathā rājānaś ca ta ṛṣayaś ca kṣatriyāḥ /
GE07bhg4c09u:1458: evaṃ bhūtāḥ parāṃ gatiṃ yāntīti kiṃ punar vaktavyam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c09u:1459: atas tvam imaṃ rājarṣi-rūpaṃ dehaṃ prāpya labdhvā māṃ bhajasva /
GE07bhg4c09u:1460: kiṃcānityam adhruvam asukhaṃ sukha-rahitaṃ cemaṃ martya-lokaṃ prāpya anityatvād vilambam akurvan asukhatvāc ca sukhārtham udyamaṃ hitvā mām eva bhajasvety arthaḥ //33//
GE07bhg4c09u:1461: madhusūdanaḥ - evaṃ cet puṇyāḥ sadācārā uttama-yonayaś ca brāhmaṇās tathā rājarṣayaḥ
GE07bhg4c09u:1462: sūkṣma-vastu-vivekinaḥ kṣatriyā mama bhaktāḥ parāṃ gatiṃ yāntīti kiṃ punar vācyam
GE07bhg4c09u:1463: atra kasyacid api sandehābhāvād ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c09u:1464: yato mad-bhakter īdṛśo mahimāto mahatā pratnenemaṃ lokaṃ sarva-puruṣārtha-sādhana-yogyam
GE07bhg4c09u:1465: atidurlabhaṃ ca mauṣya-deham anityam āśu-vināśinam asukhaṃ garbha-vāsādy-aneka-duḥkha-bahulaṃ
GE07bhg4c09u:1466: labdhvā yāvad ayaṃ na naśyati tāvad atiśīghram eva bhajasva māṃ śaraṇam āśrayasva /
GE07bhg4c09u:1467: anityatvād aukhatvāc cāsya vilambaṃ sukhārtham udyamaṃ ca mā kārṣīs tvaṃ ca rājarṣir ato mad-bhajanenātmānaṃ saphalaṃ kuru /
GE07bhg4c09u:1468: anyathā hy etādṛśaṃ janma niṣphalam eva te syād ity arthaḥ //33//
GE07bhg4c09u:1469: viśvanāthaḥ --- tato 'pi kiṃ punar brāhmaṇāḥ puṇyāḥ sat-kulāḥ sadācārāś ca ye bhaktāḥ /
GE07bhg4c09u:1472: yady evaṃ tarhi brāhmaṇā rājarṣayaḥ kṣatriyāś ca sat-kulāḥ puṇyāḥ sad-ācāriṇo bhaktāḥ santaḥ parāṃ gatiṃ yāntīti kiṃ punar vācyam ?
GE07bhg4c09u:1474: tasmāt tvam api rājarṣir imaṃ lokaṃ prāpya māṃ bhajasva anityaṃ naśvaram asukham
GE07bhg4c09u:1475: īṣat sukhaṃ vināśiny alpa-sukhe 'smin loke rājya-spṛhāṃ vihāya nityam anantānandaṃ
GE07bhg4c09u:1477: atrāsya lokasyānityatvaṃ kaṇṭhato bruvan harir mithyātvaṃ tasya nirāsāt //33//
GE07bhg4c09u:1479: man-manā bhava mad-bhakto mad-yājī māṃ namaskuru /
GE07bhg4c09u:1481: śrīdharaḥ - bhajana-prakāraṃ daśrayann upasaṃharati man-manā iti /
GE07bhg4c09u:1482: mayy eva mano yasya sa man-manāḥ tādṛśas tvaṃ bhava /
GE07bhg4c09u:1486: evam ebhiḥ prakārair mat-parāyaṇaḥ sann ātmānaṃ mano mayi yuktvā samādhāya mām eva paramānanda-rūpam eṣyasi prāpsyasi //34//
GE07bhg4c09u:1491: madhusūdanaḥ - bhajana-prakāraṃ darśayann upasaṃharati man-manā bhaveti /
GE07bhg4c09u:1492: rāja-bhaktasyāpi rāja-bhṛtyasya putrādau manas tathā sa tan-manā api na tad-bhakta ity ata uktaṃ man-manā bhava mad-bhakta iti /
GE07bhg4c09u:1493: tathā mad-yājī mat-pūjana-śīlo māṃ namaskuru mano-vāk-kāyaiḥ /
GE07bhg4c09u:1494: evam ebhiḥ prakārair mat-parāyaṇo mad-eka-śaraṇaḥ sann ātmānam antaḥkaraṇaṃ yuktvā
GE07bhg4c09u:1495: mayi samādhāya mām eva paramānanda-ghanaṃ sva-prakāśaṃ sarvopadrava-śūnyam abhayam
GE07bhg4c09u:1498: saṃsārāmbudhim uttaranti sahasā paśyanti pūrṇaṃ mahaḥ /
GE07bhg4c09u:1499: vedāntair avadhārayanti paramaṃ śreyas tyajanti bhramaṃ
GE07bhg4c09u:1500: dvaitaṃ svapna-samaṃ vidanti vimalāṃ vindanti cānandatām //
GE07bhg4c09u:1504: viśvanāthaḥ --- bhajana-prakāraṃ darśayann upasaṃharati man-manā iti /
GE07bhg4c09u:1505: evam ātmānaṃ mano dehaṃ ca yuktvā mayi niyojya //34//
GE07bhg4c09u:1510: baladevaḥ - atha pariniṣṭhitasyārjunasyābhīṣṭāṃ śuddhāṃ bhaktim upadiśann upasaṃharati man-manā iti /
GE07bhg4c09u:1511: rāja-bhakto 'pi rāja-bhṛtyaḥ patnyādi-manās tathā sa tan-manā api na tad-bhakto bhavati /
GE07bhg4c09u:1512: tvaṃ tu tad-vilakṣaṇa-bhāvena man-manā mad-bhakto bhava /
GE07bhg4c09u:1513: mayi nīlotpala-śyāmalatvādi-guṇavati vasudeva-sūnau sva-svāmitva-sva-pumarthatva-buddhyānavacchinna-madhu-dhārāvat satataṃ mano yasya saḥ /
GE07bhg4c09u:1514: tathā mad-yājī tādṛśasyātimātra-priyasya mamārcane nirato bhava /
GE07bhg4c09u:1515: tādṛśaṃ mām atipremṇā namaskuru daṇḍavat praṇama /
GE07bhg4c09u:1516: evam ātmānaṃ mano dehaṃ ca yuktā mayi nivedya mat-parāyaṇo mad-ekāśrayaḥ san mām upaiṣyasi /
GE07bhg4c09u:1519: gaṅgeva bhaktir eveti rāja-guhyam iha smṛtā //
GE07bhg4c09u:1521: [*ENDNOTE] tam ekaṃ govindaṃ sac-cid-ānanda-vigraham pañca-padaṃ vṛndāvana-sura-bhūruha-talāsīnaṃ satataṃ sa-marud-gaṇo 'haṃ paramayā stutyā toṣayāmi /
